feed.title: Trunks Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Touitomamout: Release v1.6.5
entry.content:
🏗️ Build System

  • add docker image support for arm64
  • bump actions versions

entry.title: New release for Touitomamout: Release v1.6.6
entry.content:
🐛 Bugfixes

  • remove svg in the middle of discover.md page

⚙️ Internal

  • chore: bump deps
  • chore(docs): bump deps

entry.title: New release for Touitomamout: Release v1.7.0
entry.content:
🎉 New Features

  • allow image/webp and image/gif

🐛 Bugfixes

  • add missing catch; add some debug logs
  • use the new field export
  • add gif support

🔍 Tests

  • update expectations

entry.title: New release for Touitomamout: Release v1.8.0
entry.content:
🎉 New Features

  • allow to disable post backdating

🐛 Bugfixes

  • make sure all variables are double quoted to prevent some parsing issues

🏗️ Build System

  • bump actions
  • setup vite
  • setup vitest
  • configuration cleanup

📚 Documentation Changes

  • mention the ability to disable post backdating
  • add open graph template

🔍 Tests

  • allow to disable post backdating

entry.title: New release for Touitomamout: Release v1.9.0
entry.content:
🎉 New Features

  • add support for video

🐛 Bugfixes

  • skip empty chunk from regex execution
  • make inReplyToStatusId more reliable
  • update github metadata
  • properly set root post on replies
